subject: Football
Advertising and Marketing
Headphones and Headsets
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The headphone maker Beats by Dre was a big winner on the first day of the draft, as Marcus Mariota and Jameis Winston wore its earbuds despite the fact that the league’s official sponsor is Bose.
snippet: The headphone maker Beats by Dre was a big winner on the first day of the draft, as Marcus Mariota and Jameis Winston wore its earbuds despite the fact that the league’s official sponsor is Bose.
